item.title: Aspose.BarCode for Cpp 24.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.BarCode for C++ 24.1. Please also check CodePorting.Native Cs2Cpp 24.1 release notes. All Changes Key Summary Category BARCODENET-38800 Update QualitySettings API structure Enhancement BARCODENET-38807 Add support of rMQR barcode Enhancement BARCODENET-38868 BarCodeReader could not find DotCode Bug Public API changes and backwards compatibility API added in Aspose::BarCode::BarCodeRecognition namespace
